wikipedia_page.main: Bryan Charnley (20 September 1949 – 19 July 1991) was a British artist who suffered from paranoid schizophrenia, and explored its effects in his work. He committed suicide in July 1991.

link_mentions.page: List of alumni of the Central School of Art and Design

response: The inaugural temporary exhibition was Bryan Charnley: the Art of Schizophrenia, a monographic show on the artist (and former Bethlem patient) Bryan Charnley.
